data.name: ReadInterstateApIdentification
data.value: select top(1) CCA_TRANSACTION_DT, CCA_TRANS_SER_NUM, NAME_LAST from CKT_INTERST_AP_ID where (CCA_TRANS_SER_NUM = @ccaTransSerNum) and (CCA_TRANSACTION_DT = @ccaTransactionDt)

data.name: ReadInterstateCase
data.value: select top(1) TRANS_SERIAL_NBR, TRANSACTION_DATE from CKT_INTERST_CASE with(readuncommitted) where (TRANS_SERIAL_NBR = @transSerialNbr) and (TRANSACTION_DATE = @transactionDate)
